keyMappings:
map <tab> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <c-t> Vomnibar.activateInNewTab
map <c-d> scrollFullPageDown
map <c-u> scrollFullPageUp
map h previousTab
map l nextTab
map d removeTab
map u restoreTab
map H moveTabLeft
map L moveTabRight
map J goBack
map K goForward
map y copyCurrentUrl
map T Vomnibar.activateEditUrlInNewTab

unmap v
map vf createTab https://mangadex.org/titles/feed
map vy createTab https://bardiel.magi.vpn:9095/
map vv createTab https://rootly.com/account/alerts
map vb createTab https://beaconcha.in/dashboard?validators=5977,5978,5979
map vp createTab https://mail.proton.me/u/120/inbox
map vc createTab http://caspair.magi.vpn/
map vm createTab https://mail.google.com/mail/u/0/#inbox
map vn createTab https://notes.jgs.pw/
map va createTab http://arael.magi.vpn/
map vz createTab http://zeruel.magi.vpn/
map vg createTab https://gh.status.im/
map ve createTab https://coinmarketcap.com/currencies/ethereum/
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
n: https://search.nixos.org/options?channel=20.09&from=0&size=30&sort=relevance&query=%s Nix Options

# More examples.
#
# (Vimium supports search completion Wikipedia, as
# above, and for these.)
#
# g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
# l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
# az: https://www.amazon.com/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon
# qw: https://www.qwant.com/?q=%s Qwant
